```{r}

library(tidyquant)
library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)

Bitcoin_data <- tq_get("BTC-USD", get = "stock.prices", from = "2017-01-01", to = "2018-09-08")

btc <- ggplot(Bitcoin_data, aes(x = date)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = close)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = rollmean(close,50)))
  
btc



ggplot(Bitcoin_data, aes(x = date)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=MA200_BTC), colour = "red")+
  geom_line(aes(y=adjusted), colour = "blue")


```
